name: 104 BPM
description:
Keep them alive with the power of 104 BPM!

Keep your chest compressions to the beat in this CPR rhythm game!

Controls:

Use the A S D keys on the left, and the J K L keys on the right.

When the white note hits the heart icon, press the corresponding key.

Thank you very much for playing my game! I hope everyone has a good LDJAM46!

:)
